title: Calcule phenSimilarity
name: phenSimilarity
description: This method allows to compare a list of symptoms with another

examples.title: Example usage:

Parameter.description: String that indicates if the execution has been done by Dx29 WebApp Client or not. By default is false.

Success 200.description: A list with all symptoms and the information about the comparision with the list to compare.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
   {
       "Id": "HP:0009115",
       "HasPatient": true,
       "HasDisease": false,
       "Relationship": "None",
       "RelatedId": null,
       "Score": 0
   },
   {
       "Id": "HP:0040064",
       "HasPatient": false,
       "HasDisease": true,
       "Relationship": "None",
       "RelatedId": null,
       "Score": 0
   }
]

Error 4xx.description: BodyFormat Body must be a json with list_reference and list_compare keys, and both keys must have array values

examples.title: Error-Response: Request with not correct body: null
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
    Invalid Request data: SyntaxError: Unexpected token n in JSON at position 0

examples.title: Error-Response: Request with not correct body format: send json instead of a list

title: Get version
name: About
description: This method allows to get the version of the microservice
